title: Company Leave Policy
content: Employees are entitled to 20 days of paid leave annually. Leave requests should be submitted at least 5 working days in advance via the HR portal.

title: Work From Home Guidelines
content: Employees can work from home up to 2 days per week. Approval must be obtained from the direct manager. VPN usage is mandatory.

title: Expense Reimbursement
content: Employees can claim work-related expenses such as travel, meals, and lodging. Receipts must be submitted within 30 days of the expense via the finance portal.

title: Tech Support
content: For hardware or software issues, contact IT support via the internal ticketing system. Support hours are from 9 AM to 6 PM on weekdays.
